Beautician App

beautician_app

LaunchScreen
Main
TheBeautyShop needs your location to show nearby beauty services, salons, and help connect you with local beauticians.
TheBeautyShop needs your location to provide location-based services and notify you about nearby offers.
TheBeautyShop needs your location to show nearby beauty services and send you relevant notifications about nearby salons.
TheBeautyShop needs camera access to take photos for your profile, capture before/after images, and scan QR codes for appointments.
TheBeautyShop needs access to your photo library to select profile pictures, upload service images, and share your beauty transformations.
TheBeautyShop needs permission to save photos to your library for your beauty journey memories.
TheBeautyShop needs microphone access for video calls with beauticians and recording video testimonials.
TheBeautyShop can access your contacts to help you invite friends and share beauty experiences.
TheBeautyShop needs calendar access to add your beauty appointments and send you reminders.
TheBeautyShop needs full calendar access to manage your beauty appointments and schedule reminders.
TheBeautyShop needs calendar access to add your beauty appointments.
TheBeautyShop uses Face ID for secure and quick login to your account.
TheBeautyShop may use Bluetooth to connect with nearby devices for payment processing.
TheBeautyShop may use Bluetooth for connecting with payment devices.
TheBeautyShop uses this to provide personalized beauty recommendations and relevant advertisements.
TheBeautyShop can play background music during your virtual beauty sessions.
TheBeautyShop uses speech recognition for voice search and hands-free navigation.
TheBeautyShop uses motion data to enhance AR beauty try-on features.
